articles.author: icc
articles.title: 'He's a master of spin': Ponting lauds Ashwin ahead of 100th Test - ICC Cricket
articles.description: On the latest episode of the ICC Review, Australia legend Ricky Ponting recalled his time with Ravichandran Ashwin at the Delhi Capitals.
articles.content:
Ponting worked closely with Ashwin at Delhi Capitals in the Indian Premier League (IPL) where the former Australian captain is the head coach.
He's a master of spin in any conditions, Ponting said. … [+653 chars]
